definition: heartbeat/heart rate/(fig.) emotionally affected/aroused (of desire, emotion, interest etc)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
shaking one to the core/extremely disturbing/hair-raising (idiom)
to feel a rush of excitement (idiom)

sentences.english: Doppler ultrasound is part of the echocardiogram test.
sentences.chinese: 也是超声波心动图检查的一个部分。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of echocardiography in tricuspid valve lesions (TVL).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价超声心动图对三尖瓣病变的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-bradycardic effect of xindekuai(XDK)in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究心得快抗心动过缓作用。

sentences.english: It was a pair I echocardiography eyes.
sentences.chinese: 那是一双让我心动的眼睛。

sentences.english: Describes a method to detect the edge of omnidirectional M-mode echocardiography images.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种全方向M型心动图的边界提取方法。

sentences.english: The heart-shaped studs in clear crystal pavé will make your heart melt.
sentences.chinese: 心形透明密镶水晶耳钉足以让你心动。

sentences.english: Through this exhibition item, we can experience a "thrilling journey into space".
sentences.chinese: 通过本展项，将可进行一场惊心动魄的太空之旅。

sentences.english: An electrocardiogram and echocardiogram showed no compromise of cardiac functions.
sentences.chinese: 心电图和超声心动图检查显示心脏功能无损害。

sentences.english: Physical examination revealed tachypnea; tachycardia, and cyanosis.
sentences.chinese: 体格检查发现呼吸急促，心动过速及发绀。

sentences.english: All art, like all love, is rooted in heartache.
sentences.chinese: 艺术就像爱情，源于怦然心动。

sentences.english: The diagnosis was mainly based on electrocardiogram and echocardiogram.
sentences.chinese: 心电图及超声心动图是正确诊断的重要方法。

sentences.english: The result suggested that 2-DE had specific diagnostic value for this disease.
sentences.chinese: 结果认为二维超声心动图对本病有特异性诊断价值。

sentences.english: Thank you once let me echocardiography, now only heartache.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你曾经让我心动，如今只剩下心痛。

sentences.english: It may ferment soul- stirringly section of sentiments.
sentences.chinese: 它可以把一段感情酝酿到惊心动魄。

sentences.english: AMVS should be differentially diagnosed with rupture of aortic sinus aneurysm.
sentences.chinese: 超声心动图诊断AMVS需与主动脉窦瘤破裂鉴别。

sentences.english: Not all tachycardias or bradycardias mean you have heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有心动过速或过缓都意味着心脏病。

definition: to feel a rush of excitement (idiom)
to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to burst with joy (idiom)/to be over the moon/to be elated
the affection, or heart, of a young woman
fig. restless, because of fear or strong emotions
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
